title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 55.3 - Specifications and requirements for padded visors and padded visor holders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 55.3 - Specifications and requirements for padded visors and padded visor holders

State Regulations
(a) Every motor
vehicle shall be equipped with two sun visors constructed of or covered with
energy-absorbing material. (b) Each
sun visor holder or mounting shall present no rigid material edge radius of
less than 0.125 inch that is statically contactable by a spherical 6.5 inch
diameter head form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
55.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
